member.name: T:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.BipedNPCSettings
member.summary: Biped NPC (Non-Player Character) setting.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.BipedNPCSettings.LogicFile
member.summary: Gets or sets file name of SymOntoClay logic file. The file describes active logic which will be executed on the NPC.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.BipedNPCSettings.HostFile
member.summary: Gets or sets file name of SymOntoClay host file. The file describes facts which are visible for other NPCs or can be recognized in some way by player.

member.name: T:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.DeviceOfBiped
member.summary: Represents part of body of the NPC or Player which are required for doing actions or using things (game objects).

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.DeviceOfBiped.Head
member.summary: Represents the head of the NPC or Player.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.DeviceOfBiped.RightHand
member.summary: Represents the right hand of the NPC or Player.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.DeviceOfBiped.LeftHand
member.summary: Represents the left hand of the NPC or Player.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.DeviceOfBiped.RightLeg
member.summary: Represents the right of the NPC or Player.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.DeviceOfBiped.LeftLeg
member.summary: Represents the left leg of the NPC or Player.

member.summary: Game object settings.

member.summary: Gets or sets file name of SymOntoClay host file. The file describes facts which are visible for other NPCs or can be recognized in some way by player.

member.summary: Represents biped NPC (Non-Player Character)

member.name: T:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.IGameObject
member.summary: Represents each game object which is not NPC, Player or Place.

member.summary: Repseresents manual controlled game object.

member.summary: Gets manual controlled game object.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.IManualControlledObject.Devices
member.summary: Gets list of devices of of the NPC or Player which are using the game object.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.IManualControlling.AddToManualControl(SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.IGameObject,SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.DeviceOfBiped)
member.summary: Adds a game object into manual controlled area of the NPC or Player.
member.param: Describes biped device which will be using the game object.

member.summary: Adds a game object into manual controlled area of the NPC or Player.
member.param: Describes list of biped devices which will be using the game object.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.IManualControlling.RemoveFromManualControl(SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.IGameObject)
member.summary: Removes a game object from manual controlled area of an NPC or Player.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.IManualControlling.GetManualControlledObjects
member.summary: Gets list of manual controlled game objects by the NPC or Player.
member.returns: List of manual controlled game objects.

member.summary: Represents some place of a game world. It can be both a point and an area.

member.name: T:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.IPlayer
member.summary: Represents Player.

member.summary: Gets creation time.

member.name: T:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.LoggingSettings
member.summary: Logging settings.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.LoggingSettings.LogDir
member.summary: Gets or sets root dir for file logging.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.LoggingSettings.RootContractName
member.summary: Gets or sets root contract name for remote logging or debugging game logic.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.LoggingSettings.Enable
member.summary: Gets or sets value of enable logging. It alows enable or disable logging or remote connection for whole components synchronously.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.LoggingSettings.EnableRemoteConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets value of enable remote connection. It alows enable or disable remote connection for whole components synchronously. It doesn't touch local logging.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.LoggingSettings.PlatformLoggers
member.summary: Gets or sets list of platform specific loggers. It alows us to add, for example, console logger for Unity3D.

member.summary: Gets or sets file name of SymOntoClay host file. The file describes facts which are visible for other NPCs or can be recognized in some way by player.

member.summary: Gets or sets file name of SymOntoClay host file. The file describes facts which are visible for other NPCs or can be recognized in some way by player.

member.summary: Settings for creation (saving) runtime image of executed code.

member.summary: Gets or sets user defined description of the image.

member.name: T:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore
member.summary: Represents core of a game world.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore.Instance
member.summary: Gets instance of the class.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore.SetSettings(SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldSettings)
member.summary: Sets general settings into the instance. This method can be run just once in the start of game or application. You can not use the framework before calling this method. Calling other methods before this will provoke exceptions. You can not call the method after disposing the instance.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore.EnableLogging
member.summary: Gets or sets value of enable logging. It alows enable or disable logging or remote connection for whole components synchronously.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore.EnableRemoteConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets value of enable remote connection. It alows enable or disable remote connection for whole components synchronously. It doesn't touch local logging.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore.GetBipedNPC(SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.BipedNPCSettings)
member.summary: Registers an instance of NPC by passed settings. Returned agent provides communication between game level in Unity3D and logical core.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore.GetPlayer(SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.PlayerSettings)
member.summary: Registers an instance of Player by passed settings. Returned agent provides communication between game level in Unity3D and logical core.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore.GetGameObject(SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.GameObjectSettings)
member.summary: Registers an instance of game object by passed settings. Returned agent provides communication between game level in Unity3D and logical core.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore.GetPlace(SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.PlaceSettings)
member.summary: Registers an instance of place by passed settings. Returned agent provides communication between game level in Unity3D and logical core.

member.summary: Load image by image info.

member.summary: Stop execution.

member.summary: Creates (saves) image of execured code.
member.returns: Instance of image info about created (saved) image.

member.summary: Returns true if execution was started, otherwise returns false.

member.summary: Returns image info about last created (saved) image.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.UnityAsset.Core.WorldCore.GetImages
